title: Mac issues still occuring
body:
Still getting those fps drops after lots of action is happening on the screen, I also learned after 50 mins in a game the fps literally stays low no matter what ii think cuz too much info or some sht idk lmao, norm is 60 then drops 19-24.

Thanks

replies.body:
Hiya! 

We do have an update on the issue, which you can find [here](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-reports-eu/jT9W0Jc1-16-04-16-update-on-mac-performance-issue).

It's never too late to quit LoL guys... Due to this bug i've been playing many awesome steam games and even HoTS, and i have to say, this feels like a vacation, i'm having fun, these games have ACTUAL QUALITY support for Mac OSX, plus i'm not stressed out because of the awful community, just think about it, even if you want to return to LoL when te bug is fixed (well if Riot actually tries) don't try to play it.
get this and an unstable ping rate. both happened in march, nothing to date has fixed it. game has been made unplayable.
